== Introduction ==

{{{#!wiki red/solid
~+'''This distribution has been inactive since November 2008.'''+~
}}}

Elbuntu was a Live-CD Linux distribution that used Ubuntu as a base environment on which to package the <nowiki>[[https://www.enlightenment.org/|Enlightenment]]</nowiki> [E17] Desktop Environment. Releases were made starting with the first Ubuntu LTS release, 6.06 "Dapper Drake" and culminating with the final iteration based on Ubuntu 8.04 "Hardy Heron." It is developed and maintained by <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~elbuntuteam|elbuntuteam]]</nowiki>.
